function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on backup energy sources","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to energy supply disruptions during a pandemic situation","Mitigation":"Explicitly include backup energy sources in the energy strategy criteria","Technologies":"Backup energy storage systems, microgrid technology","People":"People relying on energy supply in built environments","Owner":"Policy makers, building managers, energy providers"},{"Description":"Lack of specificity in achieving energy efficiency","Impact":"Inefficient use of energy resources and increased energy consumption","Mitigation":"Specify the technologies or approaches to achieve energy efficiency in buildings","Technologies":"Energy-efficient appliances, smart building automation systems","People":"Builders, developers, building owners","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, industry associations, building certification organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of specificity in water-saving strategies","Impact":"Inefficient use of water resources and increased water consumption","Mitigation":"Specify select appliances and fixtures for water-saving, and promote water-efficient technologies","Technologies":"Low-flow faucets, water-efficient appliances, greywater recycling systems","People":"Building occupants, water utility providers","Owner":"Building designers, architects, water management authorities"}]}
